title: Your masterkey to the internet
subtitle:
Say hello to instant passwordless onboarding and increased customer conversion rates.
Encrypted. Hypersecure. Standardized. Free.

Powered by digital identity credentials
description: The GATACA Wallet enables users to securely store identity credentials and manage access to these right from their phone. These credentials may include
lineText:
With the GATACA wallet, users are in control of their personal data.
 Send and receive credentials, anytime, anywhere

bullets.title: Users are in control of their personal data
bullets.subtitle: Send and receive credentials, anytime, anywhere

list.title: DIGITIZED
list.description: Following the W3C Verifiable Credentials standard so they can be used worldwide

list.title: VERIFIABLE
list.description: Trusted Authorities signs them cryptographically so they can be trusted by everyone

list.title: SECURED
list.description: In the wallet with biometric and blockchain technologies to ensure that only the User can control it

headlineblock.headline: Wallet features don't stop there
bullets:
- Issuance of self-attested Credentials
- Storage of Credentials sealed with eIDAS certificates
- Back up and recovery
- Automatic Key rotation capabilities
- Resolution of EBSI registries

imageCarrousel.title: Discover what you can do with the GATACA Wallet

list.text: View who has access to your data & revoke consent permissions at any time
Password-free access to digital services, biometric enabled
